name: Cache Cleaner – Scheduled
author: Lumiverse Dynamic

sections.description:
Cache Cleaner

Scheduled Cache Cleaner
A Smart “Must Use” Add-On!

Compatible with:
1. Autoptimize
2. WP Rocket
3. W3 Total Cache
4. WP Super Cache
5. WP Fastest Cache
6. Comet Cache
7. Cache Enabler – WordPress Cache

Email Notifications
Every Time Cache is Cleaned you will be Notified

Cache Cleaner will Clean Up your Cache Folders.
Take a look if your Speed Optimization Plugin is Supported.

Keep your Cache Size Under Control.
Easy to Use and Effective !

You Want to Request Support for Another Optimization Plugin in our Next Release?
or You Need Help with your Website?
Check out our Services, or just contact us: Lumiverse Dynamic
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins Page
  2. Add New
  3. Search for “Cache Cleaner”
  4. Install & Activate
  5. Navigate to Cache Cleaner in your admin menu
  6. Choose How Often you Need the Plugin to Clean your Cache.
  7. Choose the Plugins you are Using and you Need to Activate the Scheduled Clean Up.
  8. Ready to go !
sections.faq:
I don’t see my Caching Plugin

Please contact us and send us your request. We will try to include support for your optimization plugin in our next release.
sections.changelog:
1.0.7

Tested for WP 5.5.1.

1.0.6

Fix: ReSchedule. Please Verify your Settings and Save.

1.0.5

Fix: Schedules changed ( Daily, Weekly, Monthly ).

1.0.4

New: Email Notification

1.0.3

  • Added Support for WP Rocket
  • Minor Security Fix

1.0.2

  • Added Support for Comet Cache
  • Added Support for Cache Enabler
  • New Interval added: 1 Month
  • Fixed Purge WP Fastest Cache Function
  • Fixed Minor Schedule Compatibility

1.0.1

Fixed Purge Cache Functions

1.0.0

  • First Release
